Entities.Name: Demographic Information
Entities.Definition: Information including age, height, weight, and marital status.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient is 45 years old, 165 cm tall, weighs 70 kg, and is single.

Entities.Name: Clinical Pathology
Entities.Definition: Details regarding the pathological assessment of breast cancer.

Entities.Name: Treatment Information
Entities.Definition: Data pertaining to the treatment protocols administered, including drug names and surgery details.
Entities.Sample Data: Patient underwent mastectomy followed by adjuvant chemotherapy including Taxol and Herceptin.

Entities.Name: Genetic Markers
Entities.Definition: Information on genetic markers relevant to breast cancer such as HER2, ER, and PR status.
Entities.Sample Data: HER2 positive, ER and PR negative.

Entities.Name: Prognostic Information
Entities.Definition: Details regarding the prognosis and outcome predictions based on clinical data.
Entities.Sample Data: The estimated 5-year survival rate is 85% based on tumor stage and receptor status.

Dataset.Name: Breast Cancer Clinical Notes
Dataset.Details: Dataset comprises various types of clinical documentation, including encounter notes, operation records, pathology notes, radiology notes, progress notes, and discharge summaries from 100 breast cancer patients.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: Not provided; presumably, the guidelines are detailed within the internal documentation or supplementary materials of the study.
